data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Faille, Arnaud, Fresneda, Javier, Bourdeau, Charles (2013): Discovery of a new blind ground beetle in western French Pyrenees, and its relevance to the phylogeny of Pyrenean hypogean Trechini. Zootaxa 3686 (4): 482-492, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3686.4.6
